component.name: Phaedra Terminal Emulator
component.summary: A GPU-accelerated cross-platform terminal emulator and multiplexer

description.p: Phaedra is a terminal emulator with support for modern features such as fonts with ligatures, hyperlinks, multiple windows, tabs and split panes.
Configuration is expressed using Lua and many powerful functions are provided to help you customize your terminal to your workflow.

Integrated ssh allows using multiple tabs and panes without requiring tmux to be installed on the remote host, and remote phaedra multiplexer support allows tmux+mosh style workflows without using tmux or mosh, while providing a fully native GUI locally.

screenshot.caption: Multiple windows, tabs and panes are supported
Quickselect makes mouseless selection fast and convenient
Dynamically change color schemes via escape sequences
Use gradients as background image attachments
Compose multiple background layers with parallax scrolling
Split the screen into panes and use mouse-less pane selection mode to navigate them

description.p: Featuring more powerful key and mouse bindings, new lua functions for working with color, json, time, processes and windows, reduced scrollback memory consumption, increased search performance, IME on Wayland and more!
